resources.string: Welcome to your smart wallpaper changer app. Select your wallpaper once and change it everytime just by shaking your phone!
Set the threshold value for shaking. (800-4800)
Shake the phone to test the threshold value set above. When enough shaking is detected the image below turns red. Tap on it to make it blue again.
Select an image from the list to set as wallpaper. After tapping you\'ll see a larger preview.
Tap on \'set wallpaper\' button to set the image as phone\'s current wallpaper.
In settings, you can change the threshold value of the shake. You can also test the value here by a demo shaking. \n\nYou can also activate and deactivate wallpaper changing by shake.
Set wallpaper and change settings to your comfort. Then exit the app. Later you won\'t need to open the app again to change wallpaper.

After you\'ve quit the app, anytime you shake your phone, your wallpaper will automatically change to the next one in the list. You\'ll get a notification at that time. Minimum time gap between two subsequent changes is 2 seconds.
